Source.Name: nload
Source.Summary: Monitors network traffic and bandwidth usage.
Source.Description: Nload is a console application which monitors network traffic and bandwidth usage in real time. It visualizes the in- and outgoing traffic using two graphs and provides additional info like total amount of transfered data and min/max network usage.

Package.Name: nload
Package.Summary: Monitors network traffic and bandwidth usage.
Package.Description: Nload is a console application which monitors network traffic and bandwidth usage in real time. It visualizes the in- and outgoing traffic using two graphs and provides additional info like total amount of transfered data and min/max network usage.
